name: Anorien
startIntroPart1: Hi Aragorn, heir to the ancient kings !
startIntroPart2: You have come back to the ivory tower to lead your people against their many foes. The ancient evil is rising in the east, but danger may also com from the south and the haradrim or the north from the easterlings, the dwarves or even the elves. Will your allies in Rohan be ready to answer the call or will they be too occupied with Isengard ? Only you can now save and rebuild a strong and safe Gondor nation and... who knows, maybe reunite Gondor and Arnor ?
attacked: The light of the West will prevail from this agression !
defeated: It is over, will the light disappear from Middle Earth ?
introduction: I am Aragorn Elessar, heir of Isildur!
uniqueText: Starts with [Rationalism] adopted, Starts with [Piety] adopted
